title: Did a rash of 1940s sightings lead to plans for a national UFO conference in Louisiana?
description: Explore the history of UFO sightings in central Louisiana, including the 1947 national conference that never happened and significant reports from the area.

title: Joe Rogan uses three haunting words to predict Americans’ reaction to UFO disclosure
description: Joe Rogan invoked three words that still haunt Americans more than two decades later while discussing how the country might [...]

title: UFO expert reveals why you're more likely to see an 'alien' over Christmas
description: In December, the UFO Reporting Centre see a huge surge in UFO sightings with a massive spike on Christmas Day.

title: Prime's UFO doco is the same old story but with shiny new faces
description: OPINION: The truth may well be out there thanks to all these interviews with government insiders on alien technology but the conspiracy theory rabbit hole still leads to the same places.
